a: AURA-X Ω is an offline emotional resonance prototype that maps tone→emotion and can answer from a local Q&A pack.
It was developed by Alim ul Haq as a research prototype.
Type how you feel or ask a question. The system senses emotion, shows intensity, and replies from rules or the offline Q&A.
Resonance tone mapping, intensity meter, continuity memory, small-talk intents, and optional offline 16k Q&A pack.
